# Water Heater SOS

> Water Heater SOS is the Inland Empire's most trusted water heater and plumbing service company. We provide professional repair, installation, and maintenance services for gas, electric, tankless, and heat pump water heaters. Licensed (CA LIC# 1140776), insured, and 5-star rated. Available 24/7 for emergency service.

Contact: (800) 697-4014
Email: info@waterheatersos.com
Location: Redlands, CA (serving the entire Inland Empire)

## Services

- [Water Heater Services](https://waterheatersos.com/water-heater-services): Overview of all water heater repair, installation, and replacement services.
- [Gas Water Heaters](https://waterheatersos.com/gas-water-heaters): Repair and replacement of gas water heaters, including pilot light issues, thermostat problems, and tank replacements.
- [Tankless Water Heaters](https://waterheatersos.com/tankless-water-heaters): Installation and repair of energy-efficient tankless water heater systems.
- [Heat Pump Water Heaters](https://waterheatersos.com/heat-pump-water-heaters): Installation and service of eco-friendly heat pump water heaters.
- [Electric Water Heaters](https://waterheatersos.com/electric-water-heaters): Repair and installation of electric water heater systems.
- [Plumbing Services](https://waterheatersos.com/plumbing): Comprehensive plumbing services including repairs and installations.
- [Drain Cleaning](https://waterheatersos.com/drain-cleaning): Professional drain cleaning and clog removal services.
- [Hydro-Jetting](https://waterheatersos.com/hydro-jetting): High-pressure water jetting for tough clogs and pipe cleaning.
- [Leak Detection](https://waterheatersos.com/leak-detection-services): Advanced leak detection technology to find hidden leaks.
- [Whole-House Repiping](https://waterheatersos.com/whole-house-repiping): Complete home repiping services for older plumbing systems.
- [Water Filtration](https://waterheatersos.com/water-filtration): Water softeners and filtration system installation.
- [Gas Leak Repairs](https://waterheatersos.com/gas-leak-repairs): Emergency gas leak detection and repair services.

## Service Areas

- [Redlands](https://waterheatersos.com/redlands): Plumbing and water heater services in Redlands, CA.
- [Riverside](https://waterheatersos.com/riverside): Plumbing and water heater services in Riverside, CA.
- [San Bernardino](https://waterheatersos.com/san-bernardino): Plumbing and water heater services in San Bernardino, CA.
- [Corona](https://waterheatersos.com/corona): Plumbing and water heater services in Corona, CA.
- [Fontana](https://waterheatersos.com/fontana): Plumbing and water heater services in Fontana, CA.
- [Rancho Cucamonga](https://waterheatersos.com/rancho-cucamonga): Plumbing and water heater services in Rancho Cucamonga, CA.
- [Ontario](https://waterheatersos.com/ontario): Plumbing and water heater services in Ontario, CA.
- [Moreno Valley](https://waterheatersos.com/moreno-valley): Plumbing and water heater services in Moreno Valley, CA.
- [Temecula](https://waterheatersos.com/temecula): Plumbing and water heater services in Temecula, CA.
- [Murrieta](https://waterheatersos.com/murrieta): Plumbing and water heater services in Murrieta, CA.
